title: Men's Stretch Denim Jeans Classic Jeans with Embroidered Design, ESDVD Street Style Regular Jeans Relaxed Fit Pants Comfy
description: 【PREMIUM FABRIC】The jeans for men are crafted from high-stretch denim and cotton blend materials (65.5% cotton, 33% polyester, 1.5% spandex), these jeans offer an incredibly soft touch and lasting comfort, ensuring that it remains comfortable for long periods of wear.

【SLIM FIT DESIGN】Men's cowboy pants with a 3D slim fit, modern slim fit cut perfectly contours to your leg shape, elongating your silhouette. Ideal for both casual and formal occasions, enhancing your style effortlessly.
【UNIQUE EMBROIDERY】Vintage-inspired embroidery adds distinctive character and visual appeal to these work pants for men, helping you stand out from the crowd and showcase your unique taste.

【ICONIC DETAILS】This daily pants has fine and organized alignment, and the sewing is firm and not easy to take off the thread. Smooth metal zipper closure and durable even after long wear. The buttons have a nice texture and the buttonholes are precise and won't fall off easily.

【SEASONAL VERSATILITY】Mid-stretch denim fabric makes these pants suitable for wear in spring, summer, fall, and winter. No matter how the temperature changes, it is always comfortable and breathable for a variety of wearing needs.Enjoy comfort and permeability regardless of the season.
